name: The Green Hills of Stranglethorn
tooltip:
The Green Hills of Stranglethorn

Collect the missing pages from The Green Hills of Stranglethorn manuscript.  Once all four chapters are complete, return them to Barnil.

Requirements:
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter I
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter II
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter III
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapter IV
